item.title: Paper accepted at npj Computational Materials!!
item.description: Our work on uncertainty-biased molecular dynamics for machine-learning interatomic potentials has been accepted at the npj Computational Materials! Great team achievement led by Viktor!!

item.title: Uncertainty-biased molecular dynamics for learning uniformly accurate interatomic potentials
item.description: In this paper we combine uncertainty-biased molecular dynamics with active learning to show how we can learn machine learning interatomic potential (MLIP) models that are more robust to predictions on extrapolative regions.
